scripts.build-app: npm run build-lib && npm run build -w=app
scripts.build-base: npm run build-lib && npm run build -w=base
scripts.build-carbon: npm run build-lib && npm run build -w=carbon
scripts.extract-strings: npm run -w app lingui:extract && npm run -w carbon lingui:extract
scripts.compile-strings: npm run extract-strings && npm run -w app lingui:compile && npm run -w carbon lingui:compile
scripts.extract-strings:dev: npm run -w app lingui:extract:dev && npm run -w carbon lingui:extract:dev
scripts.remove-dist: cd carbonmark-api && rm -rf dist && npm run build
scripts.export-app: npm run build-lib && IS_STATIC_EXPORT=true npm run build-app && IS_STATIC_EXPORT=true npm run export -w=app
